name: hugging-face-inference-api
title: Hugging Face Inference API
description: This extension allows you to directly interace with the Hugging Face Inference API. All you need is a free access token!
author: william_de_rocco

commands.name: chat
commands.title: chat
commands.description: Chat with Hugging Face Inference API.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
